Bibliographic References: PPSupp, no 204 (corrected to 133 bis); LIMC III, p. 712, Elektra I 98, pi. 547, 1
Imagery Description: (a) Stele scene—youth with drapery across lower part of body, holding fillet and phiale, resting left foot on base of stele, woman wearing black chiton with cloak, resting right hand, which holds a fillet, against the stele; above, left and right female busts, (b) A3v, with stick in right hand and egg in left, + A2r, with fillet. Neck: (a) siren, holding cista with egg, (b) female head to left.
